column4: d9500< i am new to ubuntu so technical jargon is not my strong point yet, whats ispci -v and grep audio?
ok i opened terminal and typed the command, this was the response -  00:1b.0 Audio device: Intel Corporation 82801I (ICH9 Family) HD Audio Controller (rev 03)
how can i find out if ubuntu has a driver for it?
what is the output of: wget -O alsa-info.sh http://alsa-project.org/alsa-info.sh && bash ./alsa-info.sh       select to upload to the site, what is the generated URL?
